plot outline: On completing his higher education in London, Samrat Jaikar, a super rich, sensible young man, and the only son to his mother(Sharda devi) returns to India. Sharda takes pride in her son and hands him over their entire Family business. Mother and son start leading a perfect life. But life has other plans. An unfortunate event in Samrat's life puts him into a situation where he has to make a choice. A choice that very few will ever make. A choice to try and get back his mother's life. Will his choice help him get what he really wants? Will his love accept the consequences of his Choice? Will his faith earn him what money cannot? Swami Tinhi Jagacha...Bhikari. A true story of unconditional love, faith and belief. A true story of a mother and child.
title: Bhikari
plot: An unfortunate event in Samrat's life puts him in a situation where he has to make a choice. A choice that very few will ever make. A choice to try and get back his mother's life.

On completing his higher education in London, Samrat Jaikar, a super rich, sensible young man, and the only son to his mother(Sharda devi) returns to India. Sharda takes pride in her son and hands him over their entire Family business. Mother and son start leading a perfect life. But life has other plans. An unfortunate event in Samrat's life puts him into a situation where he has to make a choice. A choice that very few will ever make. A choice to try and get back his mother's life. Will his choice help him get what he really wants? Will his love accept the consequences of his Choice? Will his faith earn him what money cannot? Swami Tinhi Jagacha..._Bhikari_ (qv). A true story of unconditional love, faith and belief. A true story of a mother and child.::Bhadresh D Pandav

Samrat Jaikar returns from London after completing his higher education.His mother Shardha Devi hands him the family business and life is going well for them as tragedy strikes soon as Sharda Devi gets admitted to hospital and slips into coma.A spiritual Guru then asks Samrat to give up his life of 0f a millionaire and pose as beggar for well being of his mother.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
